name:
ART DECO PEACOCK
invitation sample set
description:
Voila! Here they are! Art Deco peacock wedding invites!

One of my most successful cards is now available in a wedding invite version!
:-)

This is a sample set to give you an idea of what your cards can look like in real....

This sample set includes several different envelopes and card sizes, in 3 different paper types to let you compare.
So you can see the different options, the colors and quality...

Together with this set, I provide you a very practical overview of all the sizes & prices that you can have in this design...

When you decide to go with me, I give you a refund for this set.

Payment:
Please pay at the time of purchase.

Colors may vary due to monitor setting.

design: © marijke janssens

name:
PEONIES IN RETRO STYLE
save the date cards
description:
Make a bold & chique statement with this stylish cards!

Size: 3 2/8” x 5 3/8” - 82 x 135 mm
The cards are printed on luxurious 100% cotton archival paper.
The envelopes are couture level, the famous Crown Mill envelopes.

The price includes:
1 flat save the date card with rounded corners + 1 envelope. 
You can adjust the quantity that you need in the shopping cart.

The cards are available in two different color schemes, just let me know what you prefer...

I have a whole range of matching items in this design.
Feel free to contact me for more information or a price quote.

Colors may vary due to monitor setting.

design: © marijke janssens

name:
ROMANTIC GARDEN WEDDING
invitation sample set
description:
Are you having a romantic garden wedding?
Than this are the perfect cards!

This is a sample set that show you how beautiful your cards can be....

The background of the card looks like painted silk, cream with a hint of very soft dusty rose. Together with the fresh green, white & cream flowers, it's a stylish combination.

I also made a version in another color combination, with a darker background, and the text in a nice, berry purple. 

Picture 3 shows different cards that you also can have in this design.

This set includes:
1 invitation + envelopes
1 RSVP card + envelopes
1 menu card
1 folded thank you card
1 place card
You will find the invitation in 3 different paper types
a few envelopes in different colors & sizes, to let you chose from.

Together with this set, I provide you a very practical overview of all the sizes & prices that you can have in this design...

When you have more questions, or a special request, just let me know...

When you decide to go with me, I give you a refund for this cards.

Payment:
Please pay at the time of purchase.

Colors may vary due to monitor setting.

design: © marijke janssens

options.name: I want a sample of both!
